Configuring Server Pool and Qualifiers

To configure server pool, perform the following:

 1. Select the Organization from the drop-down list. By default, root is displayed.

 2. Enter the Number of Server Pools in the textbox and click Add to generate the server pool.

Figure 7-6 Server Pool

To configure server pool qualifier, perform the following:

 1. Select the Organization from the drop-down list. By default, root is displayed.

 2. Enter the Number of Qualifiers in the textbox and click Add to generate the server pool.

Figure 7-7 Server Pool Qualifier

 3. Click Config to Configure Qualifier Slots enter Min Id and Max Id.

 4. Click Add and Close

Figure 7-8 Configure Qualifier Slots

 

 5. Click Save and next to proceed further.
